channel.title: Music – 카리나(aespa)
channel.description: Recent content in 카리나(aespa) on Music

item.title: 카리나(aespa) - Sad Waltz(드라마 "도적:칼의 소리")
item.description:
작곡: 정민경, 황명흠 / 작사: 김장우
KY: 29914

I don’t know
what to call you
I don’t know
how you’ve been
‘Til now
to where we are now
You are
no strange to me
You are
still warm to me
Oh why that look
on your face hmm
Stare into space
cuz of your glances
Now I feel blue
somehow
You have to live
through this life
Your voice makes
my heart goes through
Someday
we will meet again hmm
Yeah we’ll meet again
some day
La la la la la la la
la la la la la la la
La la la la la la
la la
La la la la
la la la
Although
I can’t see you now
I lost
in my eyes
Because the wind
shades my eyes
Yet don’t know
what to say
You are
still warm to me
Oh why that look
on your face hmm
Stare into space
cuz of your glances
Now I feel blue
somehow
You have to live
through this life
Your voice makes
my heart goes through
Someday
we will meet again hmm
Yeah we’ll meet again
some day
La la la la la la la
la la la la la la la
La la la la la la
la la
La la la la
la la la
Now
I know
You left me here alone
gone away
Now
I know
You’re roaming
somewhere hmm
Waiting for you
to come back
I’ll wait for you
endlessly
